sections.heading: Investment of monies in the bond proceeds account5-1171
sections.text: Investment of monies in the bond proceeds account(Conditionally Rpld.)A. The authority board may authorize the authority's fiscal agent to invest monies in the bond proceeds account in the manner prescribed by section 5-1173.B. The order direct
